Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Rhino Tank
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
An armored personnel carrier used by the Adeptus Astartes, as well as other elite Imperial forces. Its ten passengers are covered by a Storm Bolter mounted on top of the vehicle. 

The Rhino dates back all the way to the Dark Age of Technology, where it was used to explore newly-colonized planets and transport troops into combat. When an STC fragment for it was recovered, it was quickly adopted by the Imperium of Man. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x10
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
